action_on_questions_loaded: window.malariaCase = new Case({caseID: Coconut.questionView.result.get 'MalariaCaseID'});malariaCase.fetch() if malariaCase.caseID

questions.label: Age
questions.validation: return 'Age must be between 0 and 200' if value < 0 or value > 200

questions.label: Fever currently or in the last two weeks?
Treatment Provided?
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Malaria Test Result') is 'NPF' or ResultOfQuestion('Malaria Test Result') is 'Not Tested'

questions.label: Referred to Health Facility?
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Malaria Test Result') isnt 'PF' and ResultOfQuestion('Malaria Test Result') isnt 'Mixed'

questions.label: Overnight Travel within Zanzibar 10-24 days before positive test result
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Malaria Test Result') isnt 'PF' and ResultOfQuestion('Malaria Test Result') isnt 'Mixed'

questions.label: List all locations of overnight travel within Zanzibar 10-24 days before positive test result
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Overnight Travel within Zanzibar 10-24 days before positive test result') isnt 'Yes'

questions.label: Overnight Travel outside of Zanzibar in the past year?
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Malaria Test Result') isnt 'PF' and ResultOfQuestion('Malaria Test Result') isnt 'Mixed'

questions.label: All locations and entry points from overnight travel outside Zanzibar 0-7 days before positive test result
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Overnight Travel outside of Zanzibar in the past year') isnt 'Yes'

questions.label: All locations and entry points from overnight travel outside Zanzibar 8-14 days before positive test result
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Overnight Travel outside of Zanzibar in the past year') isnt 'Yes'

questions.label: All locations and entry points from overnight travel outside Zanzibar 15-21 days before positive test result
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Overnight Travel outside of Zanzibar in the past year') isnt 'Yes'

questions.label: All locations and entry points from overnight travel outside Zanzibar 22-42 days before positive test result
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Overnight Travel outside of Zanzibar in the past year') isnt 'Yes'

questions.label: All locations and entry points from overnight travel outside Zanzibar 43-365 days before positive test result
questions.skip_logic: ResultOfQuestion('Overnight Travel outside of Zanzibar in the past year') isnt 'Yes'
